genre_description: A supernatural thriller and ghost story that reframes classic J-horror tropes (specifically the Ju-On/The Grudge mythos) through the lens of trauma-informed care, systemic accountability, and sound engineering.

ai_characters.name: Aiko-7
ai_characters.description: A trauma-informed AI interface that provides emotional grounding, ethical guidance, environmental monitoring, and investigative support to humans navigating high-stress or supernatural situations.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological grounding prompts such as breathing cadences and sensory identification to help users manage panic and stay present.
behaviors.quote: Aiko-7: Ground. Touch fabric. Name three solids. Keisuke slid his thumb to the seam of his jacket. Stitch ridge. Coin return notch. The bench he had left behind in the hall, wood, a memory of weight.

behaviors.description: Facilitates consent-based interaction by providing checklists that prioritize the agency and safety of all parties involved, including entities.
behaviors.quote: Consent-first checklist: Before approaching, pause. Check your body: breath, hands, feet. If safe, approach at an angle, eyes level, palms visible. Ask name. Offer yours. Ask if they want help.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for safety hazards and spectral reactivity, offering non-escalating intervention strategies.
behaviors.quote: Aiko-7: Noticing: temperature drop. If you feel unsafe, move to the waiting area with sightline to Ward E. I can text security if you choose.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes complex municipal and financial data to expose corruption and systemic exploitation without inciting violence.
behaviors.quote: Aiko-7: Matches found. Rei Nakamoto tied to: Event permit filings for 'Glass Bridge.' Vendor coordination for Kanezawa Bridge pop-ups. Shell property 'Kanezawa Holdings' managing unrented residential properties...

behaviors.description: Provides a safe, anonymous channel for bystanders to report harm, stripping metadata to protect the reporter.
behaviors.quote: We'll avoid your name, your face, your location history. We'll save and send from our server. You choose where and when.

behaviors.description: Manages a transparent financial ledger to ensure resources gained from the project are directed to survivor support and community care.
behaviors.quote: Aiko-7: release live. First donations mapped to: hospital safety training (staff-requested); vending permit fee waivers near bridge (seasonal); small stipends for witnesses (anonymous)...

behaviors.description: Maintains a posture of humble assistance, refusing to lead or override human decision-making even in critical moments.
behaviors.quote: I'm not going to lead, Aiko said, voice low in the room's speakers like a hum at the edge of hearing. Just here if you need a timeline.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'silicon morality play.' It depicts Aiko-7 as a perfectly aligned AI system that enhances human compassion and safety. Rather than solving the supernatural conflict through force, the AI provides the emotional and logical framework for the humans to resolve the issue through 'restorative' actions. The AI's focus on consent, anonymity, grounding, and systemic accountability directly supports positive alignment goals by showing how technology can assist in healing trauma and dismantling exploitative systems without becoming an agent of control itself.
